data.title: Go Karting Meet- K1 Speed in Santa Clara
data.meta_description: Go Karts + DSMers + Meet = A Good TimeTwo weeks from today- 7/6/12 Come out and prove your mettle against the rest of the guys. You don't really need...
data.text:
98GSXin

930

0

Jun 2, 2010

Santa Clara, California

Go Karts + DSMers + Meet = A Good Time

Two weeks from today- 7/6/12 Come out and prove your mettle against the rest of the guys. You don't really need much of a reason to go Go Karting, other than you just want to. It'll be kick ass. So if you think you've got the stones to put your self on the track and challenge everyone else to a race to the death (or just the finish line), do it. No excuses.

Here's the info about the place:

K1 Speed Santa Clara

2925 Mead Ave,

Santa Clara, CA 95051

http://www.k1speed.com/

Prices: http://www.k1speed.com/hours-pricing.html

We can go out to eat together after or something if you guys want. Make suggestions below.

Animal408

174

1

Aug 30, 2010

San Jose, California

That's what's up ill be there with my lil man. He's gonna show everyone whats up hahaha. But I'm down.
